mapper.insert: insert into member_workouts( member_no, workout_unit_no, workout_date, weight, walk_count ) values( #{memberNo}, #{workoutUnitNo}, #{workoutDate}, #{weight}, #{walkCount} )
mapper.select: select m.member_no, m.workout_unit_no, m.workout_date, m.weight, m.walk_count from member_workouts m join workout_unit wu on m.workout_unit_no=wu.workout_unit_no join member mb on m.member_no=mb.member_no where m.member_no=#{memberNo} order by workout_list_no desc
